fields.name: Targon's Brace
fields.description: +175 Health +50% Base Health Regen UNIQUE Passive - Spoils of War: Melee basic attacks execute minions below 240 Health. Killing a minion heals the owner and the nearest allied champion for 50 Health and grants them kill Gold. These effects require a nearby allied champion. Recharges every 30 seconds. Max 3 charges. Limited to 1 Gold Income item
